programme.title: Two for the Money (2005)
programme.desc: Drama about an ex-footballer whose knack for handicapping football games lands him a job with a famous sports bookie.

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street (2013)
programme.desc: A young financial whiz has a meteoric rise in the business world, but falls victim to a life of hedonistic excess and greed.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny (1992)
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South.

programme.title: Ghost (1990)
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic.

programme.title: Forrest Gump (1994)
programme.desc: The extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century.

programme.title: Just Mercy (2019)
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevensons career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman.

programme.title: Treasure (2024)
programme.desc: An American journalist decides to travel back to Poland with her Holocaust-surviving father. The goal of their trip was to revisit some of his favorite childhood locations. But an internal resistance to his past trauma proved to be more difficult than originally thought.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: Unforgiven (1992)
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff.

programme.title: Gladiator (2000)
programme.desc: An exhilarating epic about a Roman general who becomes an enslaved gladiator after he refuses to pledge loyalty to the emperors power-hungry son.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: True Grit (2010)
programme.desc: An alcoholic US Marshal and a 14-year-old girl track down her fathers killer with the help of a Texas Ranger. As the three brave dangerous American Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal.

programme.title: Coneheads (1993)
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their "Saturday Night Live" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J.

programme.title: Superstar (1999)
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury (1998)
programme.desc: Terminally uncool club-hopping brothers Doug and Steve Butabi---first seen strutting their head-bobbing stuff on "Saturday Night Live"---struggle to make it through the doors of the elite Roxbury Club and hobnob with "hotties." Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting (1997)
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by co-stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined cleaner who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: An ex-Marine sniper is recruited for a special operation and finds himself involved in a presidential assassination attempt.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: Tale of good versus evil as a detective obsessively tracks an expert thief. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Pacino and De Niro have appeared on-screen together.

programme.title: Bad Behaviour (2023)
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together.

programme.title: Last Man Standing (1996)
programme.desc: A lone stranger takes on two factions of rival bootleggers in a desolate 1930s frontier town, pitting both sides against each other and profiting from the chaotic results. Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, Christopher Walken, Michael Imperioli, David Patrick Kelly, Alexandra Powers, Karina Lombard, Leslie Mann, Ned Eisenberg, Ken Jenkins, R.D. Call, Ted Markland, Patrick Kilpatrick, Luis Contreras.

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: Michael Clayton (2007)
programme.desc: A burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: An ex-Marine sniper is recruited for a special operation and finds himself involved in a presidential assassination attempt.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker (2008)
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner heads the cast of this Oscar-winning war drama about a trio of soldiers who specialise in dismantling improvised explosive devices in Baghdad. These three members of the Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad must put their fear and their personal beefs aside to keep themselves from going to "the hurt locker", the nickname soldiers have for where you recuperate after being injured in an explosion.

programme.title: Friday Night Lights (2004)
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isnt everything, its the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissingers bestseller.

programme.title: Vantage Point (2008)
programme.desc: In this riveting thriller, an assassination attempt is made on the president in front of a crowd, but no two witnesses can agree on who did what to whom. A Secret Service agent (Dennis Quaid) must race against time to uncover the shocking truth before the conspirators escape. Matthew Fox, Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Lauras abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An American military officer leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theatre owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich in a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theatre.

programme.title: Goodfellas (1990)
programme.desc: Director Martin Scorseses riveting real-life study of New York mob life.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: Noah receives a warning from God about a great flood, and constructs an ark to save creation as the planet is cleansed of sin. When the rain begins to fall, Noah and his family are forced to defend their massive vessel from malicious invaders.

programme.title: Gladiator (2000)
programme.desc: An exhilarating epic about a Roman general who becomes an enslaved gladiator after he refuses to pledge loyalty to the emperors power-hungry son.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latters henchmen try to head them off and free their leader.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)

Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse.

programme.title: Ghost (1990)
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic.

programme.title: The Gift (2015)
programme.desc: Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo, who begins to surprise the couple with unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts.

programme.title: Prospect (2018)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. Theyve secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moons toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This sequel spoofs "Signs", "The Ring", "The Matrix Reloaded", "The Others", "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile".

programme.title: Ida Red (2021)
programme.desc: After being given 20 years in prison for armed robbery, career criminal Ida "Red" Walker fears that she wont survive long enough to see through her sentence due to being diagnosed with a terminal illness. Intent on staging one last heist, she turns to her son and right hand Wyatt to help her bring her plans to completion, and to give her a chance to regain her freedom.

programme.title: Luce (2019)
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isnt as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lees play of the same name.

programme.title: Just Mercy (2019)
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevensons career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman.

programme.title: Back to the Future (1985)
programme.desc: An eccentric scientist builds a time machine, which accidentally transports a high-school student back to the 1950s, where the teenager inadvertently interferes with the budding romance between his future parents. The boy must figure out how to set things right, or risk completely altering the future.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
programme.desc: A teenager time-travels from 1985 to 2015 in order to save his parents and his children from the disasters precipitated by his own mistake when he travelled to 1955 and bought a book in order to enrich himself in the future.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
programme.desc: A teen must leap the space-time continuum to 1885 in the DeLorean time machine in order to rescue its inventor, whose 70-year-old letter reveals that he has retired to the Old West to live out his days there. Upon arriving, the boy finds the scientist in love and in danger.

Former followers of Yogi Bhajan discuss the social conditions of the '60s and '70s that led to the rise of anti-establishment spirituality and the growth of Yogi Bhajan's following. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Yogi Bhajan's backstory and the invention of his mystical persona who preached a healthy, drug-free lifestyle, enlightenment, and equality is scrutinized. By 2007, Kundalini yoga hits the mainstream and years later Katie Griggs opens the RA MA Institute in Los Angeles, claiming direct links to Yogi Bhajan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: The lavish lifestyle that Yogi Bhajan led with are now the luxuries that Guru Jagat enjoys as the spiritual leader of RA MA Institute. A tell-all 2020 memoir changes the narrative about Bhajan but Guru Jagat and RA MA continue to staunchly and publicly defend Yogi Bhajan's legacy. (Repeat).

This nonstop thrill ride follows Constantine as he tries to free his sibling from jail by going deeper into the chaotic and violent underbelly of New York City. (Repeat).

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: The third installment of the horror franchise follows adult film star Maxine Minx after escaping a Texas massacre. She claws her way to 1980s Hollywood pursuing a dream role. But a killer stalks LA's starlets. As blood spills, Maxine's dark past threatens to shatter her shot at fame. (Repeat).

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. Soon, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise, in this nerve-shredding horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: Young dancers gather in a remote and empty school building to rehearse on a cold and wintry night. The all-night celebration soon turns into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn that their sangria is laced with LSD. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a memoir by Jeannette Walls, a young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents. Now married to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values. (Repeat).

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Astronauts travel to the moon to study a black monolith before another mission to Jupiter goes awry due to a malfunctioning computer system. Later regaining control of his spaceship, the surviving astronaut travels through a dazzling star-gate on a mysterious evolutionary mission. Featuring groundbreaking, Oscar-winning special effects. (Repeat).

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: In this moving drama, two aging friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on vacation together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with a rare form of dementia that has a rapid decline, John Knox tries desperately to continue his work as a hitman, with memory loss getting in the way. When John's son Miles shows up at his door begging for help because he's killed the man who impregnated his daughter, John goes into overdrive with his friend Xavier to cover up the crime. Unfortunately, his good intentions for Miles backfires, and soon, his son is involved in John's criminal world. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: A young Native American rodeo cowboy faces an identity crisis after suffering a near-fatal head injury and being told that he can never ride again. When he takes on the grueling job of training a wild horse he finds it exhilarating, but also a sad reminder that the direction of his life is forever altered. (Repeat).

programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.desc: Mourning the loss of three of his family members, a detective receives a haunting phone call from his deceased niece, who is existing on an alternate timeline two weeks prior. It is now up to Jack to talk her through the coming days to save her and her family's lives in this mystery thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: In this relentless psychological thriller, blue-collar worker Adam Cassidy becomes a corporate spy for a ruthless CEO who wants him to infiltrate the competition. In time, Adam realizes that he's being used as a pawn in a much-larger game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Director M. Night Shyamalan followed the chilling "The Sixth Sense" with this riveting thriller. Bruce Willis is security guard David Dunn, who survives a devastating train wreck miraculously unharmed. The owner (Samuel L. Jackson) of a comic-book art gallery sees him as a mysterious protector with a higher calling, but Dunn is doubtful. Robin Wright Penn, Spencer Treat Clark, Eamonn Walker. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The biographical drama chronicles the rise of the four Von Erich brothers in the field of professional wrestling in the 1980s. Coached by their father Fritz Von Erich, Kevin, Kerry, David, and Mike become famous wrestling champions as they dominate the ring with countless victories. Soon, their fame turns into a curse when deadly tragedy strikes the Von Erich family. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: Wonderful performances and rich characters color this comedy-drama starring Joan Allen and Kevin Costner. Allen excels as a suburban housewife and mother of four daughters who spins into bitter alcoholism after her husband leaves her. But her romantic life becomes even more complicated when she's drawn to a boozy, lazy ex-baseball player (Costner). Erika Christensen, Evan Rachel Wood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This bittersweet saga dramatizes the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (Repeat).

programme.title: Disobedience
programme.desc: A formerly exiled woman returns to her orthodox Jewish family after the death of her father. Her family is shocked by her visit, but her sister-in-law is inspired by her presence to break free from the rigid rules and guidelines of their faith. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
programme.desc: A hardened survivor is hired for an impossible task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In 2003, an Indonesian scientist makes a devastating discovery. In 2023, now outside of the quarantine zone, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate as they navigate a long-abandoned Boston overrun with Infected. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After a global pandemic, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: On the streets of a newly free Kansas City, Henry fights to protect his brother Sam from rebel soldiers who will stop at nothing to appease their ruthless leader. As her manhunt continues, Kathleen doubles down on her quest for revenge, while Ellie forms a meaningful friendship. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After months of traveling, Joel and Ellie receive a grave warning about what lies ahead. Later, Ellie learns more about Joel's past – while Joel tries his best to forget. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives – and the fate of the world – forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors, and draws the attention of its leader. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After being pursued by Infected, a pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Years later, Ellie is forced to grapple with the emotional toll of her journey, while Joel faces a devastating decision of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The Mad Max movie prequel follows Furiosa as a young woman after she is snatched from her sanctuary by Dementus' biker horde. When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: Teenager Jody and her dad accompany each other at a music concert featuring pop star Lady Raven. Excited to share a night of music and fun, Jody and her dad soon become entangled in a deadly game. While she enjoys the music, her dad discovers a frantic FBI search for a deranged killer called The Butcher. As the hunt intensifies, a sinister truth is revealed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (Repeat).

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: After bumping into Elvis Presley at a party, teenager Priscilla Beaulieu becomes enamored with the musical icon. Their courtship and consequent marriage change Priscilla's life. What follows is a tantalizing, turbulent journey of love and fame. Based on the true story of the Presley family, the drama film chronicles Priscilla's relationship with Elvis Presley. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: In rural western Ireland, Mina, a twentysomething artist, finds herself lost amidst an expansive wilderness. Upon finding shelter for the night with three strangers, the unlikely foursome soon finds themselves the target of a sinister, enigmatic creature haunting the night. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their son is killed in an accident. The wife soon performs a Hindu ritual to speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force in this chilling horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: A flamboyantly gay couple pretend to be straight in order to impress the parents of the woman their son wants to marry because the girl's father is a rabidly right-wing U.S. Senator. (Repeat).

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: Grappling with the onset of middle age, a Chinese immigrant discovers that she can traverse across time and space. Teaming up with her alternate lives, the unlikely allies realize that they alone possess the power to protect the world from calamity, plunging them into the midst of an outlandish quest. (Repeat).

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Hilarity scores a slam dunk when a former high-school basketball star gets a second shot at life after he's transformed back into a teenager. Back in high school, Mike O'Donnell was an MVP. But then Mike sacrificed everything in order to stay by his expectant girlfriend Scarlett. Twenty years later, Mike's life is falling apart when he's suddenly transported back into his teenage body and he learns that by trying to recapture his best years, he could risk losing it all. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: A black man who lives with his best friend and works in an elderly care facility dreams of living in the grand Victorian house his grandfather built in the Fillmore District. Now a white, affluent area, he is totally priced out of the neighborhood, but it doesn't stop him from dreaming in this drama about place, identity and race. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A San Francisco police detective becomes frustrated when the laws of the day keep him from apprehending a crazed sniper who is terrorizing the city. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: Reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Las Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into the web of Lou's criminal family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure. (Repeat).

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: In this superhero stunner, after being sent to Earth from planet Krypton by his parents with a special object from his home planet in tow, Clark Kent grows up with the help of his earthly adopted parents and later assumes the identity of Superman and sets out to defend Earth from the villainous General Zod. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: A game show that invites grade-school kids to play interactively through their TVs. A mind-scrambling menu of educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. Includes subjects like history, math, spelling and nature. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.title: Temple Grandin
programme.desc: A portrait of animal scientist Temple Grandin, who, as a young woman in the 1960s and 1970s, overcame the stigma of autism to become a leading authority on the humane treatment of livestock. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: In this spirited fantasy adventure, the Smurfs take an unexpected trip through a portal and land in the middle of New York City, and they must find their way home before their archnemesis Gargamel (Hank Azaria) tracks them down. Directed by Raja Gosnell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother. (Repeat).

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: Schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) realizes that the girl he has struggled to avoid may be his one true love in this heartfelt romantic comedy. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce, who does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enter junior high, Bryce discovers girls and realizes his true feelings for Juli. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chipmunk brothers Alvin, Simon and Theodore, with lovely (though high-pitched) singing voices, become pop sensations in this rollicking comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle-of-the-bands competition and face off against a group of female singing chipmunks known as the Chippettes in this wacky and hilarious sequel to the family-friendly hit. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: Aquaman and The Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The sequel follows Aquaman as he prepares for another battle against Black Manta. Equipped with the deadly Black Trident, Black Manta is determined to avenge his father's death. With no one by his side, Aquaman seeks the help of his brother Orm, hoping to build a strong alliance that can empower him to defeat Black Manta who vows to kill him at all costs. Aquaman must push himself and overlook the differences he has with his brother to save the world from destruction. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill is back as paleontologist Alan Grant for another wild walk in the park. William H. Macy and Tea Leoni costar as a couple whose son is lost on a remote dino-infested island. Posing as wealthy adventurers, they lure Grant to the island to help in their search, and all three get much more than they bargained for. The special effects are outstanding. Alessandro Nivola, Trevor Morgan, Michael Jeter. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Espiritu de la Salsa
programme.desc: New Yorkers from all walks of life, including a doctor, a police officer, a construction worker and a Wall Street trader, come to Spanish Harlem to learn the art of salsa dancing from instructor Tomas Guerrero. Directed by Francisco Bello and Tim Sternberg. (Repeat).

programme.title: How Do You Measure a Year?
programme.desc: For 17 years, filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt filmed his daughter Ella on her birthday in the same spot, asking her the same questions. In just 29 minutes, we watch her grow from a toddler to a young woman with all the beautiful and sometimes awkward stages in between. Each phase is captured fleetingly but makes an indelible mark. Her responses to her father's questions are just a backdrop for a deeper story of parental love, acceptance, and ultimately, independence. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach pre-schoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first film in the series introduced maladroit French police inspector Jacques Clouseau, who attempts to foil high-society thieves who have targeted a prize jewel called the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini's score was Oscar nominated. (Repeat).

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: This animated tale focuses on Krypto the Super-Dog, otherwise known as Superman's pet. Since he has his own superpowers, Krypto enjoys saving the world with the Man of Steel. However, he finds himself challenged when Superman is kidnapped one day, and the other human superheroes can't help. With the help of superpower-infused animals in a shelter, it's up to Krypto to save the world and save his superhuman. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.sub-title: From Here to There, De Aqui Para Alla
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach preschoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise this Christmas as a mysterious reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As Frodo nears the end of his journey to destroy the One Ring in Mount Doom, he finds himself tempted by its evil powers. Eleven Oscars, including Best Picture, went to director Peter Jackson's majestic finale to his blockbuster trilogy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: What a fantastic magical delight this is. Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: An all-star cast and family-friendly spyjinks power the third chapter of the delightful "Spy Kids" film series. This time, a villainous computer programmer kidnaps Carmen and traps her inside a video game. Her younger brother Juni springs into action and enters the game to rescue her. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marcel: The Shell with Shoes On
programme.desc: The animated film follows the life of a young mollusk named Marcel as he discovers the world anew. When a documentary filmmaker shares an online snippet of Marcel, the shy shell goes viral. Soon, Marcel goes on a life-changing adventure to find his lost family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Living in the perfect Barbieland, Barbie and Ken lead a carefree existence, but soon, Ken finds himself questioning his simple life. Enamored by the human world, he convinces Barbie to leave their comfort zone and take a trip outside Barbieland. Soon, the Mattel CEO feels threatened by the duo's daring decision and pursues them to guide them back to where they belong. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A bride-to-be in Greece attempts to solve the mystery of her paternity by reading her mother's diary. Based on the popular ABBA-inspired stage musical. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: Belichick & Saban: The Art of Coaching
programme.desc: Bill Belichick and Nick Saban--two of the most successful and revered football coaches in the history of the sport--open up in this documentary that looks at their four-decade-long friendship. Combined with one-on-one interviews and extensive inside access captured over the past three decades, the film includes topics never publicly broached before. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: In this thrilling animated adventure, a rare macaw named Blu (voice of Jesse Eisenberg) is brought to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female (voice of Anne Hathaway) of his species, but the pair are kidnapped by a gang of greedy animal smugglers, forcing them to stage a daring escape with the help of some new friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the beloved series, Shrek is catapulted into an alternate version of Far Far Away where ogres are persecuted, Rumpelstiltskin rules the land and Princess Fiona doesn't know who he is. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: In this stunning action epic, a tormented Hercules must summon his inner hero to save the kingdom of Thrace from an evil warlord. With the help of his loyal band of mercenaries, he wages a valiant fight to restore peace to the troubled land. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Retired spy Marissa (Jessica Alba) is reactivated by her agency in order to stop the Timekeeper from taking the entire planet hostage, and she gets some unexpected help from her stepdaughter Rebecca and stepson Cecil in this family-friendly thrill ride. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: After accusing fellow historian David Irving of being a Holocaust denier, Deborah Lipstadt is sued for libel and forced to provide proof of her claims in court. This gripping drama is based on a real-life legal case, which reached a verdict in 2000. (Repeat).

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this action-packed comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse. After the resurrected villain recruits four superpowered followers, Professor X and his charges attempt to stop them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: In the year 10,191, an emperor rules the universe consisting of two rival factions, and power relies on control of a magic spice. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Tomorrow Man
programme.desc: One is preparing for a disaster that will never happen, the other is buying things she'll never need. But in a small town, these two try and find love. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Feline spy Kitty Galore plots to conquer the world and gain the upper paw over her rivals in this hilarious comedy-adventure. In order to fight this unforeseen threat, cats and dogs must band together to face a common enemy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Have Tourette's but Tourette's Doesn't Have Me

programme.desc: A look at the life and career of NBA Hall of Famer Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, the league's all-time leading scorer and six-time MVP and World Champion. In addition to his on-court success, the film also explores his off-court persona over the past 50 years. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: This stunning fantasy adventure follows the Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace as they face their greatest temptations in the land of Narnia, where they travel on a magnificent ship known as the Dawn Treader. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: In this action-packed adaptation starring Robert Downey Jr. as Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's legendary detective, Sherlock Holmes teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a mysterious new adversary who's determined to destroy England. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: Ordinary teen Billy Batson possesses the ability to transform into a superhero alter ego with just a single word. As Batson continues to hone his crimefighting skills and tackle new challenges, he faces a threat that puts his life in jeopardy. The sequel to the 2019 film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A popular high school counselor (Matt Dillon) is charged with raping the most popular girl (Denise Richards) in school---a charge that leads investigators into a bizarre maze of deceit and debauchery. Neve Campbell, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Daphne Rubin-Vega, Robert Wagner, Bill Murray, Carrie Snodgress, Jeff Perry, Cory Pendergast, Marc Macaulay, Toi Svane. (Repeat).

programme.title: Talk To Me
programme.desc: A group of friends plays a dangerous game against the spirit world. After stumbling on an embalmed hand, the group figures out how to use it to conjure spirits. Consumed by this thrilling new power to communicate with the dead, they unlock the spirit world and must face the deadly consequences. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: A send-up of the TV series, it's the story of a lovely lady, a man named Brady, and their kids, whose wholesome '70s natures clashes with the grungy '90s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey and Al Pacino bring their "A" games in this winning profile of a pair of high-profile, high-stakes sports handicappers. The former is an ex-college quarterback with a knack for covering the lines and the latter plays his wily mentor. The film, based on a true story, is directed by D.J. Caruso, and features an outstanding costarring turn by Rene Russo as Pacino's troubled wife. Russo also serves as one of the executive producers. Armand Assante, Jeremy Piven, Jaime King. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezra's future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding action thriller, Driver (Dwayne Johnson) seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brother's death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Driver's life before he completes his task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: Joe and Kyle make contact with a potential new source of intel. A newly expanded team conducts a hit with unanticipated results. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: Dexter tries to stay one step ahead of Lundy's manhunt for the Bay Harbor Butcher, while also trying to distance himself from Lila (Jaime Murray), which she is determined not to allow. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: The ever-persistent Doakes tracks down Dexter to the scene of his latest killing, where he devastates Dexter with a surprising revelation about Harry; Lundy's task force zeroes in on the Bay Harbor Butcher. (Repeat).

programme.title: Scream VI
programme.desc: Bored of the quaint town of Woodsboro, the notorious serial killer Ghostface leaves his small-town stomping grounds behind, pursuing more ambitious conquests in New York City. Determined to overthrow his reign of terror once and for all, a cohort of familiar faces returns to seek justice for the bloodshed. The sixth installment in the horror franchise. (Repeat).

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: The Wayans brothers (stars Marlon and Shawn and director Keenen Ivory) will make you howl with laughter as they slash teen horror movies in this raunchy spoof. After covering up a fatal accident, clueless teens are murdered by a bumbling serial killer. Anna Faris, Shannon Elizabeth, Lochlyn Munro. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge. (Repeat).

(Repeat).

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: The warehouse discovery rattles the team. Joe is torn between two urgent missions. (New).

programme.title: Killing Eve
programme.desc: Intel from Berlin points to the existence of a mole, prompting Eve to undertake her first surveillance operation. Meanwhile, Villanelle is sent to England to eliminate a member of British Intelligence. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt

programme.desc: Writer-director Kevin Smith deftly blends sweet romance with crude, lewd inspired lunacy in this outrageously funny comedy. Seth Rogen and Elizabeth Banks play cash-strapped platonic roommates who try to make it in the adult-movie business in an attempt to get out of debt. A superb ensemble cast of costars features Craig Robinson, Jason Mewes, Justin Long, Ricky Mabe and Jeff Anderson. Former adult-film performers Traci Lords and Katie Morgan also have roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: The thrills never stop when an ex-CIA agent is targeted by his former protégé while racing to protect a witness. As the bullets start to fly, he must live long enough to protect his charge, and root out the mole who has put his entire mission in jeopardy. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Astronauts on the International Space Station retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life in this sci-fi thriller. The specimen begins to show signs of aggression, threatening the entire mission. (Repeat).

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan, of "Memento" fame, directed this taut and atmospheric crime thriller, a remake of a 1997 Norwegian film. Al Pacino is in top form as L.A. detective Will Dormer, who travels to a remote Alaska town to investigate a murder. Unable to sleep, the weary Dormer is drawn into an intense cat-and-mouse game with the sly and taunting killer. Robin Williams, Hilary Swank. (Repeat).

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissinger's bestseller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Noah receives a warning from God about a great flood, and constructs an ark to save creation as the planet is cleansed of sin in this stunning Biblical epic. Later, Noah and his family are forced to defend their massive vessel from malicious invaders. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Dynamic Samuel L. Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three '70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jackson's uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bad Behaviour
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind. (Repeat).

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: Desperate for a financial solution to their troubles, four alienated girlfriends plan a series of bank heists, growing more daring and reckless with each success. Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox, Kimberly Elise, John C. McGinley, Blair Underwood, Anne Marie Horsford, Ella Joyce, Charlie Robinson, Chaz Lamar Shepard. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Investment-firm analyst Peter Sullivan (Zachary Quinto) uncovers disturbing information that could put his company in jeopardy in this riveting thriller set during the 2008 financial crisis. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: A send-up of the TV series, it's the story of a lovely lady, a man named Brady, and their kids, whose wholesome '70s natures clashes with the grungy '90s. (Repeat).

programme.desc: An urban teen moves to a rural Midwestern town where dancing is outlawed and fights to stage a high-school prom complete with dancing. He also falls for a local girl whose minister dad is behind the dirty dancing boycott. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules. (Repeat).

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is superb in this intelligent and complex character study of a burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience as he comes to grips with his amoral actions. Written and directed by Tony Gilroy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isn't as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lee's play of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: S.O.G.: The Book of Ward
programme.desc: Andre Ward's journey from the streets of Oakland to the International Boxing Hall of Fame. Facing an all-too familiar series of obstacles including substance abuse, the loss of a parent, drug dealing and teen pregnancy, how Ward faced that adversity is what separates him from the rest. Fight after fight he defied the odds and silenced his critics. And then, guided by faith and devotion, he walked away, choosing his role as a father and a husband over his boxing career. (Repeat).

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: A former U.S. security adviser's dark past comes back to haunt her. (Repeat).

programme.title: After Innocence
programme.desc: Travesty-of-justice chronicle of several wrongly imprisoned men who are set free after DNA evidence exonerates them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mary Lou Williams: The Lady Who Swings the Band
programme.desc: Jazz pianist Mary Lou Williams was a genius ahead of her time. From child prodigy to "Boogie-Woogie Queen" to groundbreaking composer to mentoring some of the greatest musicians of all time, she never ceased to astound those who heard her play. But for a Black woman in the early 1900s, life as a star did not come easy. (Repeat).

programme.title: All Up in the Biz
programme.desc: Acclaimed director Sacha Jenkins shines a spotlight on the life and rhymes of the 'clown prince of hip-hop', Biz Markie, best known for his Top 40 hit, "Just a Friend." A who's who of legends like rappers Rakim, Big Daddy Kane, Doug E Fresh and actor/comedian Tracy Morgan share how Markie's playful approach to the genre made him a hip-hop icon and left an indelible mark in the world of music. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A warden/football fan tags a new convict, an ex-pro QB, to choose a team from among his inmates to play against the well-trained prison guards. (Repeat).

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: Aaron attempts to bury his recently deceased father while dealing with his eccentric family and a number of newly exposed family secrets, including his dad's relationship with a blackmailing dwarf in this uproarious comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Harder They Come
programme.desc: The story of a 1950s Kingston Robin Hood (Jimmy Cliff), driven by a striking reggae score. Jose: Carl Bradshaw. Preacher: Basil Keane. Elsa: Janet Bartley. Detective: Winston Stona. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of young bank employees to steal 80 million dollars in one of the largest bank heist in US history. (Repeat).

programme.title: MVP
programme.desc: On the streets of Hollywood, a recently retired NFL player is saved from scandal by a homeless veteran. With their "glory days" behind them, the two men bond in search of purpose and identity. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Thee Lavell Crawford
programme.desc: Live from New Orleans, Lavell Crawford is back with a new comedy special, riffing on everything from white neighborhoods to getting blessed with impossibly good deals on chicken and so much more. (Repeat).

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Saga of a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson, who basically plays himself. (Repeat).

programme.desc: This documentary offers an unfiltered look into the lives of black trans sex workers. These women not only feel ostracized by the world but also within their own black community. The documentary sets out to find out if there is a way for these women to be accepted while living a lifestyle that is failing to be accepted by so many. (Repeat).

programme.title: When We Were Kings
programme.desc: Leon Gast's Oscar-winning portrait of Muhammad Ali, filmed in 1974 during the buildup to his highly publicized fight with George Foreman in Zaire. Narrated by Spike Lee, Norman Mailer and George Plimpton. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A Coney Island gang known as the Warriors goes to the Bronx to attend a city-wide meeting of all gangs; at that event, however, the psychotic leader of a rival outfit, the Rogues, assassinates the head of the city's foremost gang, but the Warriors are pegged as culpable, and they must fight their way across rival turf to make it safely back to their territory. (Repeat).

programme.title: Nana's Boys
programme.desc: Nana's Boys focuses on the intimate life of a couple who are confronted with the fact that their relationship is not as solid as they thought. (Repeat).

programme.title: Warrior Strong
programme.desc: To save the career he endangered with his hotheaded attitude, professional basketball player Bilal Irving takes on a new job - coaching the failing basketball team in his hometown of Dumont, Ontario. He's got just one obstacle: his former coach, whose ideas about coaching vastly differ from that of Bilal's. The two will have to put aside their differences and their attitudes if this small-town team is to have any chance at winning. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rift
programme.desc: Agent Jason Cole is a man of morals and principles but when faced with the ultimate decision, will he do the right thing at the risk of everything? Darren Cain, David Lee Garver. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: An ambitious nightclub promoter discovers that the woman he tried so hard to get is even harder to get rid of when their casual romance turns deadly serious. programme.title: The Aggressives
programme.desc: This acclaimed documentary -- made by one of the fashion worlds most sought after casting directors -- picks up where Paris is Burning left off, focusing on a group of six NYC lesbians who dress and identify as men, blurring the lines between butch dyke and trans-male identities. For our guest host, writer-artist-performer and member of NY's own House of Ladosha, Juliana Huxtable, the film explores "the complexities of how desire is negotiated between the multitude of gender types in the ballroo (Repeat).

programme.desc: An in-depth look at the on and off-court life of the 16-time NBA All-Star, who has helped the Lakers win five championships. Included: the mentors, allies and rivalries that have shaped his career, and his thoughts on what lies ahead. (Repeat).

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: An obscure black politician is chosen to run for president, who astonishes his detractors when his folksy campaign catches fire. (Repeat).

programme.desc: An ambitious nightclub promoter discovers that the woman he tried so hard to get is even harder to get rid of when their casual romance turns deadly serious. programme.desc: The genesis of sweet sweetback's Baadassss Song. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Travesty-of-justice chronicle of several wrongly imprisoned men who are set free after DNA evidence exonerates them. (Repeat).

programme.desc: In a dystopian future of oxygen scarcity, Maya and her daughter Zora cling to survival underground. Their fragile existence is upended by the arrival of a couple claiming ties to Maya's presumed dead husband. As secrets unravel, mother and daughter must confront the true nature of their visitors to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Tim Meadows gets down and dirty as his Saturday Night Live character Leon Phelps in this raunchy comedy. programme.desc: In the 1930s two gambling-house proprietors fend off gangster Bugsy Calhoune from muscling into their operation. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: A Memphis pimp and pusher tries to redeem himself by becoming a rapper. (Repeat).

Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse. (Repeat).

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: Six adventurers arrive on an ancient shore seeking refuge. Soon, their dreams dissolve into dread when they encounter a malevolent force. Amidst fracturing bonds, a courageous young woman confronts the unsettling truth that survival demands unspeakable choices against an enigmatic and menacing adversary, forcing them to navigate the darkest corners of their humanity to endure. programme.desc: Three black friends gather for a wedding, and recall their teen years growing up in 1980s Inglewood, Cal., after the groom gets cold feet and starts thinking about his high-school sweetheart. A touching and nostalgic coming-of-age tale. (Repeat).

Though Vail sees the case as a way to gain publicity, the revelations in the case begin to chill him. (Repeat).

Clarence Williams III, Isaac Hayes, Dennis Farina, James Frain, Donal Logue. (Repeat).

programme.title: First Shift

programme.title: Rift

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: This wildly ambitious and deeply moving epic comprises six tales from various historical eras. An 18th-century notary goes on a sea voyage; a musician becomes an apprentice to a famous composer in 1930s Belgium; a journalist uncovers corruption at a nuclear power plant in '70s California; a contemporary publisher seeks refuge from gangsters at a nursing home; a clone escapes her job at a fast-food establishment in futuristic Korea; a tribesman struggles to survive in a postapocalyptic wasteland. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Terminal

In time, the terminal becomes a virtual country within itself, complete with culture, ambition, status, diversity and the need for love. (Repeat).

As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis. (Repeat).

These three members of the Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad must put their fear and their personal beefs aside to keep themselves from going to "the hurt locker," the nickname soldiers have for where you recuperate after being injured in an explosion. Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. Guy Pearce, Ralph Fiennes. (Repeat).

Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezra's future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Treasure
programme.desc: An American journalist decides to travel back to Poland with her Holocaust-surviving father. The goal of their trip was to revisit some of his favorite childhood locations. But an internal resistance to his past trauma proved to be more difficult than originally thought. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This electrifying biopic of Brazilian soccer star Pelé recounts his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. (Repeat).

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: During the Civil War, the four daughters of a doctor who went to the front patiently wait for his return to their mother. Jo, Amy, Beth and Meg March try to compensate for their father's absence and lack of resources by continuing their creative activities and helping others. As we grow up, they all take a different path. Jo, who wants to become a writer, dreams of moving to New York. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: As the Gestapo escalates their crimes against humanity across Eastern Europe, individuals of minorities and Jewish descent increasingly fear for their lives. Skilled forger Cioma Schönhaus, a young Jewish man, begins crafting fake passports for the members of his community to help shepherd them to safety. Yet his counterfeiting abilities do not stop at documents as he carefully crafts a new identity to take down the enemy from the inside. Based on true events. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A beautiful woman stops aging after a car accident, and remains 29 for several decades in this intriguing fantasy. She refuses to get close to anyone in order to keep her condition a secret, but reconsiders her solitary lifestyle after falling in love with a philanthropist. (Repeat).

programme.title: It Could Happen to You

programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas

programme.title: The Moon and Back
programme.desc: Isabel May stars in this comedy as a high school student stumbling through her senior year, until she discovers her dad's unfinished screenplay and makes his crazy dream her reality. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: When an art thief gets trapped inside a luxurious penthouse apartment, he struggles to survive and maintain his mental sanity as days go by and the wealth that surrounds him becomes irrelevant.

programme.title: A Thousand and One
programme.desc: The foster care system can be punishing for children, especially when they are living in a hostile situation. Inez commits a necessary crime and kidnaps a six-year-old boy named Terry. The new mother and son duo now live in New York City, and Inez needs to protect her child at all costs.
